channel.title: Zhenhuan Yan on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Zhenhuan Yan on EICP-LAB

item.title: Academic Seminar
item.description: PhD candidate Zhenhuan Yang presented his research at an internal Northwestern Polytechnical University seminar via an online platform. His work, prelinminary preliminarily entitled “Identifying Climate Adaptation Projects in Local Government Bonds Using AI-Supported Text Analysis,” was conducted in collaboration with Siyuan FAN and Professor Yangsiyu LU. He exchanged viewpoints and discussed LLM-related topics with attending scholars.
